title: 【課務組】4月9日本校停課一天 School will be closed for one day on April 9
author: 課務組
content:
分類： 課程公告
來源： 教務處課務組 - 課務組 - utd1003@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6122-6126
對象： 全校教師_全校學生_兼任教師
標題： 【課務組】4月9日本校停課一天 School will be closed for one day on April 9 
日期： Wed, 3 Apr 2024 20:45:29 +0800

各位老師及同學，您好：
因0403花蓮地震，為顧及花蓮交通狀況及師生安全，4/9(週二)本校停課一天。

教務處課務組關心您

Dear professors and students,
Due to the 0403 Hualien earthquake, considering the traffic conditions in Hualien and the safety of teachers and students, our school will be closed for one day on April 9 (Tuesday).
May peace be with you,
Curriculum division
